description.value:
Attempts to bypass cogitators or electronic devices it is embedded into, giving limited control over them. Gives +20 to Tech-Use Tests for the "Security Systems" Special Use of the skill. If succeeding on the test, reduce time required by one minute per DoS (minimum of 10 seconds).

Requirements

"Limited Control" could mean disabling security systems, accessing stored data, etc.

Effect: Rare

Notes: -
